string-array.name: item_descriptions
string-array.item: Classic italian cheese pizza. A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping
Our burger is a Â¼ lb* of savory flame-grilled beef and a simple layer of melted American cheese, topped with crunchy pickles, yellow mustard and ketchup on a soft sesame seed bun.
The Classic Grilled Dog is a flame-grilled hot dog made with 100% beef topped with ketchup, mustard, chopped onions, and relish and served on a fluffy baked bun.
